title: Barcodes check out prostate cancer
title_cn: 条码检查出前列腺癌

title: A 7-nm light pen makes its mark
title_cn: 7纳米光笔在商标上留下印记

title: Towards entangled electrons
title_cn: 朝向纠缠的电子

title: Graphene helps fuel burn faster

title: Properties and emerging applications of self-assembled structures made from inorganic nanoparticles
title_cn: 无机纳米粒子自组装结构的性质和新兴应用
abstract: Just as nanoparticles display properties that differ from those of bulk samples of the same material, ensembles of nanoparticles can have collective properties that are different to those displayed by individual nanoparticles and bulk samples. Self-assembly has emerged as a powerful technique for controlling the structure and properties of ensembles of inorganic nanoparticles. Here we review different strategies for nanoparticle self-assembly, the properties of self-assembled structures of nanoparticles, and potential applications of such structures. Many of these properties and possible applications rely on our ability to control the interactions between the electronic, magnetic and optical properties of the individual nanoparticles.
abstract_cn: 就像纳米粒子显示的特性不同于相同材料的散装样品的特性一样，纳米粒子的集合可以具有与单个纳米粒子和散装样品所显示的特性不同的集体特性。 自组装已成为控制无机纳米粒子团簇的结构和性能的强大技术。 在这里，我们回顾了纳米粒子自组装的不同策略，纳米粒子自组装结构的性质以及此类结构的潜在应用。 这些性质和可能的应用中有许多取决于我们控制单个纳米粒子的电子，磁性和光学性质之间相互作用的能力。</ p>

title: Efficient narrow-band light emission from a single carbon nanotube p–n diode
title_cn: 单个碳纳米管PN二极管的高效窄带光发射
abstract: Electrically driven light emission from carbon nanotubes could be used in nanoscale lasers and single-photon sources, and has therefore been the focus of much research. However, high electric fields and currents have either been necessary for electroluminescence, or have been an undesired side effect, leading to high power requirements and low efficiencies. Furthermore, electroluminescent linewidths have been broad enough to obscure the contributions of individual optical transitions. Here, we report electrically induced light emission from individual carbon nanotube p–n diodes. A new level of control over electrical carrier injection is achieved, reducing power dissipation by a factor of up to 1,000, and resulting in zero threshold current, negligible self-heating and high carrier-to-photon conversion efficiencies. Moreover, the electroluminescent spectra are significantly narrower (∼35 meV) than in previous studies, allowing the identification of emission from free and localized excitons.
abstract_cn: 碳纳米管的电驱动光发射可用于纳米级激光器和单光子源，因此已成为许多研究的重点。但是，高电场和高电流要么对于电致发光来说是必需的，要么是不希望有的副作用，从而导致高功率要求和低效率。此外，电致发光线宽已经足够宽以掩盖各个光学跃迁的贡献。在这里，我们报告了单个碳纳米管p＆＃8211; n二极管的电感应光发射。实现了对载流子注入的全新控制，将功耗降低了多达1,000倍，并导致零阈值电流，可忽略的自发热和高载流子至光子转换效率。此外，电致发光光谱比以前的研究要窄得多（＆＃8764; 35 meV），从而可以识别自由和局部激子的发射。</ p>

title: A tunable phonon–exciton Fano system in bilayer graphene
title_cn: 双层石墨烯中的可调声子-激子Fano系统
abstract: Fano resonances are features in absorption, scattering or transport spectra resulting from the interaction of discrete and continuum states. They have been observed in a variety of systems. Here, we report a many-body Fano resonance in bilayer graphene that is continuously tunable by means of electrical gating. Discrete phonons and continuous exciton (electron–hole pair) transitions are coupled by electron–phonon interactions, yielding a new hybrid phonon–exciton excited state. It may also be possible to control the phonon–exciton coupling with an optical field. This tunable phonon–exciton system could allow novel applications such as phonon lasers.
abstract_cn: p共振是由离散态和连续态相互作用引起的吸收，散射或传输光谱中的特征。 它们已在各种系统中观察到。 在这里，我们报道了双层石墨烯中的多体Fano共振，该共振可通过电门控连续调节。 离散声子和连续激子（电子空穴对）跃迁通过电子声子相互作用耦合，产生新的混合声子激子激发态。 也可以通过光场控制声子激子耦合。 这种可调节的声子激子系统可以允许诸如声子激光器之类的新颖应用。</ p>

title: Ferromagnetic domain nucleation and growth in colossal magnetoresistive manganite
title_cn: 巨大磁阻锰矿中的铁磁畴成核和生长
abstract: Colossal magnetoresistance is a dramatic decrease in resistivity caused by applied magnetic fields, and has been the focus of much research because of its potential for magnetic data storage using materials such as manganites. Although extensive microscopy and theoretical studies have shown that colossal magnetoresistance involves competing insulating and ferromagnetic conductive phases, the mechanism underlying the effect remains unclear. Here, by directly observing magnetic domain walls and flux distributions using cryogenic Lorentz microscopy and electron holography, we demonstrate that an applied magnetic field assists nucleation and growth of an ordered ferromagnetic phase. These results provide new insights into the evolution dynamics of complex domain structures at the nanoscale, and help to explain anomalous phase separation phenomena that are relevant for applications. Our approach can also be used to determine magnetic parameters of nanoscale regions, such as magnetocrystalline anisotropy and exchange stiffness, without bulk magnetization results or neutron scattering data.
abstract_cn: 巨大的磁阻是由施加的磁场引起的电阻率的急剧下降，并且由于它具有使用锰矿等材料进行磁数据存储的潜力，因此一直是许多研究的重点。尽管大量的显微镜和理论研究表明，巨大的磁阻涉及竞争的绝缘相和铁磁导电相，但其作用机理尚不清楚。在这里，通过使用低温洛伦兹显微镜和电子全息图直接观察磁畴壁和磁通量分布，我们证明了施加的磁场有助于有序铁磁相的成核和生长。这些结果为纳米级复杂域结构的演化动力学提供了新的见解，并有助于解释与应用相关的异常相分离现象。我们的方法还可以用于确定纳米级区域的磁参数，例如磁晶各向异性和交换刚度，而无需大量磁化结果或中子散射数据。

title: Design considerations for tumour-targeted nanoparticles
title_cn: 肿瘤靶向纳米颗粒的设计考虑
abstract: Inorganic/organic hybrid nanoparticles are potentially useful in biomedicine, but to avoid non-specific background fluorescence and long-term toxicity, they need to be cleared from the body within a reasonable timescale. Previously, we have shown that rigid spherical nanoparticles such as quantum dots can be cleared by the kidneys if they have a hydrodynamic diameter of approximately 5.5 nm and a zwitterionic surface charge. Here, we show that quantum dots functionalized with high-affinity small-molecule ligands that target tumours can also be cleared by the kidneys if their hydrodynamic diameter is less than this value, which sets an upper limit of 5–10 ligands per quantum dot for renal clearance. Animal models of prostate cancer and melanoma show receptor-specific imaging and renal clearance within 4 h post-injection. This study suggests a set of design rules for the clinical translation of targeted nanoparticles that can be eliminated through the kidneys.
abstract_cn: 无机/有机杂化纳米颗粒可能在生物医学中有用，但是要避免非特异性背景荧光和长期毒性，需要在合理的时间内从体内清除它们。 以前，我们已经表明，如果刚性球形纳米颗粒（如量子点）的流体力学直径约为5.5纳米，并且两性离子表面电荷可以被肾脏清除。 在这里，我们显示，如果它们的流体动力学直径小于此值，则用靶向肿瘤的高亲和力小分子配体功能化的量子点也可以通过肾脏清除，这将每个量子的上限设置为5＆＃8211; 10个配体 点用于肾脏清除。 前列腺癌和黑色素瘤的动物模型在注射后4小时内显示出受体特异性成像和肾清除率。 这项研究为可通过肾脏消除的靶向纳米粒子的临床翻译提出了一套设计规则。

title: A novel intracellular protein delivery platform based on single-protein nanocapsules
title_cn: 基于单蛋白纳米胶囊的新型细胞内蛋白递送平台
abstract: An average cell contains thousands of proteins that participate in normal cellular functions, and most diseases are somehow related to the malfunctioning of one or more of these proteins. Protein therapy, which delivers proteins into the cell to replace the dysfunctional protein, is considered the most direct and safe approach for treating disease. However, the effectiveness of this method has been limited by its low delivery efficiency and poor stability against proteases in the cell, which digest the protein. Here, we show a novel delivery platform based on nanocapsules consisting of a protein core and a thin permeable polymeric shell that can be engineered to either degrade or remain stable at different pHs. Non-degradable capsules show long-term stability, whereas the degradable ones break down their shells, enabling the core protein to be active once inside the cells. Multiple proteins can be delivered to cells with high efficiency while maintaining low toxicity, suggesting potential applications in imaging, therapy and cosmetics fields.
abstract_cn: 一个普通的细胞包含成千上万种参与正常细胞功能的蛋白质，大多数疾病都与某种或多种这些蛋白质的功能异常有关。蛋白质疗法将蛋白质传递到细胞中以替代功能障碍的蛋白质，被认为是治疗疾病的最直接，最安全的方法。但是，该方法的有效性受到其低递送效率和对细胞中消化蛋白质的蛋白酶的不良稳定性的限制。在这里，我们展示了一种基于纳米胶囊的新型递送平台，该纳米胶囊由蛋白核和可渗透的聚合物薄壳组成，可以设计成在不同pH值下降解或保持稳定。不可降解的胶囊显示出长期的稳定性，而可降解的胶囊则破坏了它们的外壳，使核心蛋白一旦进入细胞，便具有活性。多种蛋白质可以高效传递到细胞中，同时保持低毒性，这暗示了其在成像，治疗和化妆品领域的潜在应用。

title: Dispersed nanoelectrode devices
title_cn: 分散纳米电极装置
abstract: The enhanced performance and reduced scale that nanoparticles can bring to a device are frequently compromised by the poor electrical conductivity of nanoparticle structures or assemblies. Here, we demonstrate a unique nanoscale electrode assembly in which conduction is carried out by one set of nanoparticles, and other device functions by another set. Using a scalable process, nanoparticles with tailored conductivity are stochastically deposited above or below a functional nanoparticle film, and serve as extensions of the bulk electrodes, greatly reducing the total film resistance. We apply this approach to solid-state gas sensors and achieve controlled device resistance with an exceptionally high sensitivity to ethanol of 20 ppb. This approach can be extended to other classes of devices such as actuators, batteries, and fuel and solar cells.
abstract_cn: 纳米颗粒结构或组件的导电性差，经常损害纳米颗粒可带入装置的性能增强和尺寸减小。 在这里，我们演示了一种独特的纳米级电极组件，其中，导电是由一组纳米颗粒进行的，而其他设备则由另一组纳米颗粒起作用。 使用可扩展的工艺，具有定制导电率的纳米颗粒会随机沉积在功能纳米颗粒膜的上方或下方，并作为体电极的延伸，从而大大降低了总膜电阻。 我们将此方法应用于固态气体传感器，并以对20 ppb的乙醇异常高的灵敏度实现了可控的器件电阻。 这种方法可以扩展到其他类别的设备，例如致动器，电池，燃料和太阳能电池。

title: Self-assembly of carbon nanotubes into two-dimensional geometries using DNA origami templates
title_cn: 使用DNA折纸模板将碳纳米管自组装成二维几何形状
abstract: A central challenge in nanotechnology is the parallel fabrication of complex geometries for nanodevices. Here we report a general method for arranging single-walled carbon nanotubes in two dimensions using DNA origami—a technique in which a long single strand of DNA is folded into a predetermined shape. We synthesize rectangular origami templates (∼75 nm × 95 nm) that display two lines of single-stranded DNA ‘hooks’ in a cross pattern with ∼6 nm resolution. The perpendicular lines of hooks serve as sequence-specific binding sites for two types of nanotubes, each functionalized non-covalently with a distinct DNA linker molecule. The hook-binding domain of each linker is protected to ensure efficient hybridization. When origami templates and DNA-functionalized nanotubes are mixed, strand displacement-mediated deprotection and binding aligns the nanotubes into cross-junctions. Of several cross-junctions synthesized by this method, one demonstrated stable field-effect transistor-like behaviour. In such organizations of electronic components, DNA origami serves as a programmable nanobreadboard; thus, DNA origami may allow the rapid prototyping of complex nanotube-based structures.
abstract_cn: 纳米技术中的主要挑战是纳米器件的复杂几何形状的并行制造。在这里，我们报告了一种使用DNA折纸将二维单层碳纳米管排列成二维的一般方法，该技术将DNA的长单链折叠为预定形状。我们合成了矩形折纸模板（＆＃8764; 75 nm＆＃215; 95 nm），该模板显示两行单链DNA。分辨率为＆＃8764;的十字图案。钩子的垂直线充当两种类型的纳米管的序列特异性结合位点，每种类型的纳米管均以不同的DNA接头分子非共价地官能化。每个接头的钩结合结构域均受到保护，以确保有效杂交。当折纸模板和DNA功能化的纳米管混合在一起时，链位移介导的脱保护和结合作用将纳米管排列成交叉结。通过这种方法合成的几个交叉结中，有一个表现出稳定的场效应晶体管状行为。在这样的电子组件组织中，DNA折纸可作为可编程的纳米面包板。因此，DNA折纸可以使基于纳米管的复杂结构的快速原型制作成为可能。

title: Nanoscale chemical mapping using three-dimensional adiabatic compression of surface plasmon polaritons
title_cn: 使用表面等离激元极化子的三维绝热压缩进行纳米化学制图
abstract: The fields of plasmonics, Raman spectroscopy and atomic force microscopy have recently undergone considerable development, but independently of one another. By combining these techniques, a range of complementary information could be simultaneously obtained at a single molecule level. Here, we report the design, fabrication and application of a photonic–plasmonic device that is fully compatible with atomic force microscopy and Raman spectroscopy. Our approach relies on the generation and localization of surface plasmon polaritons by means of adiabatic compression through a metallic tapered waveguide to create strongly enhanced Raman excitation in a region just a few nanometres across. The tapered waveguide can also be used as an atomic force microscope tip. Using the device, topographic, chemical and structural information about silicon nanocrystals may be obtained with a spatial resolution of 7 nm.
abstract_cn: 等离子，拉曼光谱和原子力显微镜领域近来经历了长足发展，但彼此独立。 通过组合这些技术，可以在单个分子水平上同时获得一系列互补信息。 在这里，我们报告与原子力显微镜和拉曼光谱完全兼容的光子等离子体设备的设计，制造和应用。 我们的方法依赖于通过金属锥形波导的绝热压缩来产生和定位表面等离激元极化子，从而在仅几纳米的区域内产生大大增强的拉曼激发。 锥形波导也可以用作原子力显微镜尖端。 使用该设备，可以获得的硅纳米晶体的形貌，化学和结构信息的空间分辨率为7＆＃160;

title: Self-organized photosynthetic nanoparticle for cell-free hydrogen production
title_cn: 自组织的光合作用纳米颗粒，用于无细胞产氢
abstract: There is considerable interest in making use of solar energy through photosynthesis to create alternative forms of fuel. Here, we show that photosystem I from a thermophilic bacterium and cytochrome-c6 can, in combination with a platinum catalyst, generate a stable supply of hydrogen in vitro upon illumination. The self-organized platinization of the photosystem I nanoparticles allows electron transport from sodium ascorbate to photosystem I via cytochrome-c6 and finally to the platinum catalyst, where hydrogen gas is formed. Our system produces hydrogen at temperatures up to 55 °C and is temporally stable for >85 days with no decrease in hydrogen yield when tested intermittently. The maximum yield is ∼ 5.5 µmol H2 h−1 mg−1 chlorophyll and is estimated to be ∼25-fold greater than current biomass-to-fuel strategies. Future work will further improve this yield by increasing the kinetics of electron transfer, extending the spectral response and replacing the platinum catalyst with a renewable hydrogenase.
abstract_cn: 人们非常感兴趣通过光合作用利用太阳能来产生替代形式的燃料。在这里，我们显示了来自嗜热细菌和细胞色素-c 6 的光系统I与铂催化剂结合可以在光照下在体外产生稳定的氢供应。光系统I纳米粒子的自组织铂化作用使电子从抗坏血酸钠通过细胞色素c 6 传输至光系统I，最后到达形成氢气的铂催化剂。我们的系统在高达55摄氏度的温度下会产生氢气，并且在超过85天的时间范围内保持稳定，并且在间歇测试时不会降低氢气产量。最大产量为＆＃8764; 5.5＆＃181; mol H 2 h ＆＃8722; 1 ＆＃160; mg ＆＃8722; 1 叶绿素，估计为比目前的生物质燃料战略大25倍。未来的工作将通过提高电子转移动力学，扩展光谱响应并用可再生的氢化酶代替铂催化剂来进一步提高产率。

title: Effective repair of traumatically injured spinal cord by nanoscale block copolymer micelles
title_cn: 纳米级嵌段共聚物胶束有效修复创伤性脊髓
abstract: Spinal cord injury results in immediate disruption of neuronal membranes, followed by extensive secondary neurodegenerative processes. A key approach for repairing injured spinal cord is to seal the damaged membranes at an early stage. Here, we show that axonal membranes injured by compression can be effectively repaired using self-assembled monomethoxy poly(ethylene glycol)-poly(d,l-lactic acid) di-block copolymer micelles. Injured spinal tissue incubated with micelles (60 nm diameter) showed rapid restoration of compound action potential and reduced calcium influx into axons for micelle concentrations much lower than the concentrations of polyethylene glycol, a known sealing agent for early-stage spinal cord injury. Intravenously injected micelles effectively recovered locomotor function and reduced the volume and inflammatory response of the lesion in injured rats, without any adverse effects. Our results show that copolymer micelles can interrupt the spread of primary spinal cord injury damage with minimal toxicity.
abstract_cn: 脊髓损伤导致神经元膜立即破坏，继之以广泛的继发性神经退行性过程。修复受损脊髓的关键方法是尽早密封受损的膜。在这里，我们表明可以使用自组装的单甲氧基聚（乙二醇）-聚（d，l-乳酸）二嵌段共聚物胶束有效地修复受压损伤的轴突膜。与胶束（直径60＆＃160 nm）一起温育的受伤脊髓组织显示出复合动作电位的快速恢复，并且钙胶束浓度远低于聚乙二醇（一种已知的早期脊髓损伤密封剂）的浓度，从而减少了钙流入轴突的数量。 。静脉注射的胶束可有效恢复运动功能，并减少受伤大鼠的病变体积和炎症反应，而无任何不良影响。我们的结果表明，共聚物胶束可以以最小的毒性干扰原发性脊髓损伤的扩散。</ p>
